channel.title: [PI/Exion] Replacing the background on Toms Cache Suite
channel.description:
I've edited the background to my liking, but no matter what I do, when I try to "repack archive"
I'm always prompted with "Cache must be rebuilt to avoid corruption, would you like to rebuild the cache?"
I lose either way, if I push yes, it rebuilds it, but then it ruins EVERYTHING I've edited in the cache so I have to start over from square one, I get all kinds of errors and such (I back up my files of course), and if I push no, it does nothing.
It's supposed to say files repacked successfully or something, what am I doing wrong?
I've tried to "Replace" the file, and I've tried deleting it, and creating a new one with the same name, but nothing seems to be working.

item.title: [PI/Exion] Replacing the background on Toms Cache Suite
